attributes.action: Stand all Governmental parties down as a result of gross misconduct
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government have failed the British people to the point where ALL of our families and friends lives are at a terrible risk of direct terrorist action; a risk that they said would be minimised by sending our military into Iraq and Afghanistan. Now that risk is now at our doorstep.
It is time for an interim military government and martial law be declared for the safety of the British people while our Government is revised and re-implemented.
attributes.background:
The British Government have allowed too many refugees to come freely into the UK, thus endangering the British people.
The war you raged in Iraq and Afghanistan was intended to minimise the risk to the British people. You all have failed in your duty to protect British nationals and our homeland

rejection.details: f you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take action, you will need to start a new petition which asks clearly for the action that you would like. This needs to be something that the UK Government or Parliament has the power to do.
